party.name: Equitable Financial Life Insurance Company
party.address: 1290 Avenue of the Americas, New York, New York, 10104

party.name: Equitable Distributors, LLC
party.address: 1290 Avenue of the Americas, New York, New York, 10104

offerAndAcceptance.offer: This Amended and Restated Agreement is made as of the 1st day of November 2023.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Both parties desire to enter into this Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: This Agreement is intended to supersede, amend and restate prior agreements.

consideration.description: Equitable Distributors will reimburse Equitable Financial for personnel, property, and services.
consideration.value: Cost allocation based on actual costs incurred for Services.

contract.legalityOfPurpose: Permitted by law under New York regulations.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Provision of services related to management and distribution of life insurance and annuity contracts.
certaintyOfTerms.price: Not directly stated; based on costs incurred.

contract.consent: Consent of both parties to proceed with the agreement.

durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: 90 days written notice from either party.

contract.representationsAndWarranties: Each party maintains ownership of their records and customer information.

disputeResolution.details: Conducted per the American Arbitration Association rules in New York, with shared costs.

contract.severability: Severability of provisions is assumed under legal standards.
contract.forceMajeure: Not explicitly mentioned but typically implied.
contract.confidentiality: Obligations to maintain confidentiality of customer information.

signature.declaration: Executed by Robin M. Raju, Chief Financial Officer.
